title: The Poisoner's Ring
description: Cale lives the quiet life, until he meets two strange travelers one windy evening. Now, Cale finds himself indentured to a man both beautiful and deadly, as quick to kill as he is to smile, who's title is whispered with cold fear: The Poisoner.Status: CompleteWord count: approx. 84,818 Note: This story is getting a facelift-please check out the rewrite!Art: Cale by thecojsz
author: Rayne Adams
